properties.title: Walliser Alpentherme Leukerbad
properties.abstract: The Walliser Alpentherme in Leukerbad is Europe's largest high-altitude medical & Alpine wellness, beauty and thermal spa.
properties.description:
Following very recent modernisation and alteration work the Walliser Alpentherme now has an indoor and outdoor thermal pool, a Roman-Irish bath, a Valais sauna village and offers over 240 health and beauty treatments.

The Walliser Alpentherme has an indoor thermal bath of 200 m2 with water temperatures of 36 and 40 degrees Celsius, and an outdoor bath (300 m2, 36Â°) with breathtaking Alpine views. Both pools are equipped with a number of integrated facilites such as neck showers, underwater massage jets, bubble couches and aero-hydro jets for you to discover.
properties.name: Walliser Alpentherme & Spa Leukerbad
